Name: Martini
Description: A classic cocktail made with gin and vermouth, typically garnished with an olive or lemon twist.

Name: Mojito
Description: A refreshing cocktail with white rum, mint leaves, lime juice, sugar, and soda water.

Name: Margarita
Description: Made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, usually served in a salt-rimmed glass.

Name: Old Fashioned
Description: A simple cocktail featuring bourbon, sugar, bitters, and a twist of citrus rind.

Name: Daiquiri
Description: A cocktail made from rum, lime juice, and simple syrup, often served shaken and strained.

Name: Negroni
Description: A bitter and aromatic cocktail with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.

Name: Piña Colada
Description: A tropical delight made with rum, coconut cream, pineapple juice, and often blended with ice.

Name: Cosmopolitan
Description: A pink-hued cocktail containing vodka, cranberry juice, orange liqueur, and lime juice.

Name: Margarita
Description: Made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, usually served with a salted rim.

Name: Moscow Mule
Description: A cocktail featuring vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice, typically served in a copper mug.

Name: Mai Tai
Description: A Tiki cocktail made with white and dark rums, orange curaçao, orgeat syrup, and lime juice.

Name: Espresso Martini
Description: A cocktail combining vodka, coffee liqueur, freshly brewed espresso, and simple syrup.

Name: Bloody Mary
Description: A savory cocktail featuring vodka, tomato juice, and various spices and flavorings, often served spicy.

Name: Sex on the Beach
Description: A fruity cocktail made with vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea
Description: Despite the name, it's not tea. This cocktail blends vodka, rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, and sour mix.

Name: Manhattan
Description: A whiskey-based cocktail made with rye or bourbon, sweet vermouth, and bitters, often garnished with a cherry.
